protein.specific_function: May function in innate immunity through activation of the lectin complement pathway. Calcium-dependent and GlcNAc- binding lectin. Enhances phagocytosis of S.typhimurium by neutrophils, suggesting an opsonic effect via the collagen region

reference.reference_text: Endo Y, Sato Y, Matsushita M, Fujita T: Cloning and characterization of the human lectin P35 gene and its related gene. Genomics. 1996 Sep 15;36(3):515-21.
